document_data.mainbody:
rvend Chisolm was a mercenary living somewhere in Faerûn in the mid–14 century DR.
He was the husband of Jemima Chisolm and the father of Derek, Allison, and Karl.
Arvend had a habit of getting drunk, until finally this led him to inadvertently kill a noble, some time in the 1350s DR. For his crime, he was executed and all the familys belongings seized. Destitute and ashamed, Jemima and the children departed to build a new life in Ravens Bluff in the Vast.
